column5: This entire 1 Bedroom/1 Bath apartment with fully functional kitchen available for your comfortable stay. Make yourself at home in this entire apartment with cozy living room, desk, Cal King bed, huge closets and wooden flooring throughout. This entire apartment is located in the heart of Frisco with grocery, shopping, easy access to freeway. Perfect place for business travelers or for families with a kid.
column8: Entire Apartment in the heart of Frisco
